Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class ServerConfiguration

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.ServerConfiguration
public class ServerConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
The server configuration, containing the parameters used to determine the port binding, gods and the log path

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getLogPath()
    The server log path, or DEFAULT_LOG_PATH if not configured
    java.lang.Integer getPort()
    The server port, or DEFAULT_PORT if not configured
    Deck loadDeck()
    Loads the deck configuration from the jar of the deck path (if specified)
    static ServerConfiguration readDefault()
    Reads the default server configuration
    static ServerConfiguration readFromFile​(java.lang.String configPath)
    Reads the server configuration from a file
    ServerConfiguration withDeckPath​(java.lang.String deckPath)
    Creates a new ServerConfiguration with the specified deck path
    ServerConfiguration withLogPath​(java.lang.String logPath)
    Creates a new ServerConfiguration with the specified log path
    ServerConfiguration withPort​(int port)
    Creates a new ServerConfiguration with the specified port

    • loadDeck

      public Deck loadDeck() throws javax.naming.ConfigurationException, java.io.IOException
      Loads the deck configuration from the jar of the deck path (if specified)
      Returns:
      The loaded deck
      Throws:
      javax.naming.ConfigurationException - if invalid configuration parameters are found
      java.io.IOException - if the deck file can't be loaded
